name: FEDERATION OF SOCIETIES FOR ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION
briefDescription: Federation of Societies for Enviornmental Protectiona) To strike a balance between human population and available natural resources for a healthy life, society and the environment.b) To eliminate poverty through the introduction of income-generating schemes utilising locally available resources through judicious planning.c) To help farmers in the agriculture sector in the task of prevention of soil-erosion, landslides and general degradation of the environment as a whole by way of providing necessary inputs.d) To promote agro-forestry, production forestry preservation forestry and aesthetic forestry in the region for multipurpose benefits.e) To devise ways and means to protect and develop indigenous flora, fauna, ecosystems and biodiversity as well as scenic spots all over the region.f) To organize seminars, workshops, conferences, discussions and debates on important issues and problems related to the environment and ecology of the region and people's well being.g)To organize training and skill improvement camps for capability building for youths, workers and organizations engaged in developmental activities.
